analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol:
	Contract EthereumUnionToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol#224)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EthereumUnionToken.burn (/unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol#239) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of EthereumUnionToken.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol#255) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EthereumUnionToken.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0xede4edd0c0209db3172a9a07607b47fcf57e6355.sol#255) is not in mixedCase
